name: *,::before,::after
purpose: Sets box-sizing to border-box and removes default border width and style for all elements, including pseudo-elements.

name: :focus-visible
purpose: Applies a dashed outline with a customizable width and offset to elements when they are focused and visible.

name: :visited
purpose: Changes the color of visited links to a specified variable color.

name: hr
purpose: Sets the color of horizontal rules to inherit and applies a top border width of 1px.

name: b,strong
purpose: Increases the font weight to bolder for bold text elements.

name: small
purpose: Sets the font size to 0.875em for small text elements, making them slightly smaller than the default text size.

name: sub,sup
purpose: Adjusts the font size to 0.75em and sets line height to 0 for subscript and superscript elements, positioning them relative to the baseline.

name: sub
purpose: Positions subscript elements 0.25em below the baseline for proper alignment.

name: sup
purpose: Positions superscript elements 0.5em above the baseline for proper alignment.

name: a
purpose: Styles anchor elements with a color defined by the variable --nt-color-action-link-default and sets an outline offset of 2px.

name: button
purpose: Styles buttons with a transparent background, inherited color, and no margin or padding, ensuring consistent appearance across browsers.

name: button:disabled
purpose: Disables pointer events for buttons, making them non-interactive when disabled.

name: button:not(:disabled)
purpose: Sets the cursor to pointer for buttons that are not disabled, indicating they are clickable.

name: img,video
purpose: Ensures images and videos are displayed as block elements with automatic height and a maximum width of 100% for responsive design.

name: svg:not(:root)
purpose: Allows SVG elements to overflow visibly, preventing clipping of content within the SVG.

name: figure
purpose: Removes default margin from figure elements, ensuring they align with surrounding content.

name: table
purpose: Sets tables to collapse borders, use current color for borders, and removes text indentation for consistent styling.

name: thead,tbody,tfoot,th,tr,td
purpose: Inherits border color and width for table elements to maintain consistent styling across table sections.

name: fieldset
purpose: Removes default padding and margin, and sets minimum width to zero for fieldset elements to ensure consistent layout.

name: input,optgroup,select,textarea
purpose: Ensures form elements inherit font family, use a font size of 1em, a line height of 1.15, and have no margin for uniform appearance.

name: [type='search']
purpose: Styles search input fields to appear as textfields with a specific outline offset of -2px.

name: summary
purpose: Displays the summary element as a list item with a pointer cursor, indicating it is interactive.

name: [hidden]
purpose: Hides elements with the hidden attribute by setting their display to none, overriding any other display settings.

name: input::-ms-reveal,input::-ms-clear
purpose: Hides the reveal and clear buttons in input fields on Microsoft browsers by setting their display to none.

name: input:-webkit-autofill,input:-webkit-autofill:hover,input:-webkit-autofill:focus,input:-webkit-autofill:active
purpose: Applies a very long transition to the background color of autofilled input fields, effectively preventing the default autofill styling.

name: h1,.nb-h1
purpose: Styles the main heading with a specific color, font size, weight, and line height using CSS variables. It has a margin bottom of 0.5em and no margin top.

name: h2,.nb-h2
purpose: Styles the second-level heading with a specific color, font size, weight, and line height using CSS variables. It has a margin bottom of 0.5em and no margin top.

name: h3,.nb-h3
purpose: Styles the third-level heading with a specific color, font size, weight, and line height using CSS variables. It has a margin bottom of 0.5em and no margin top.

name: h4,.nb-h4
purpose: Styles the fourth-level heading with a specific color, font size, weight, and line height using CSS variables. It has a margin bottom of 0.5em and no margin top.

name: h5,.nb-h5
purpose: Styles the fifth-level heading with a specific color, font size, weight, and line height using CSS variables. It has a margin bottom of 0.5em and no margin top.

name: h6,.nb-h6
purpose: Styles h6 elements with a specific color, font size, weight, and line height, and sets margins for spacing.

name: p,.nb-paragraph
purpose: Styles paragraph elements with a defined font size, line height, and margins for spacing.

name: p:last-child,.nb-paragraph:last-child
purpose: Removes the bottom margin for the last paragraph element to avoid extra spacing.

name: p > a,.nb-paragraph > a
purpose: Styles links within paragraphs with a solid bottom border, bold font weight, and no text decoration.

name: p > a:hover,p > a:active,p > a:focus,.nb-paragraph > a:hover,.nb-paragraph > a:active,.nb-paragraph > a:focus
purpose: Changes the bottom border style to dashed when links within paragraphs are hovered, active, or focused.

name: .nb-btn
purpose: Styles a button with a primary color, bold font, and rounded borders. It includes transitions for color, background-color, and border-color.

name: .nb-btn:disabled
purpose: Modifies the button's idle color to a disabled state color (#c8c8c8) when the button is disabled.

name: .nb-btn:focus
purpose: Sets the outline color to the active button color when the button is focused, with an outline offset of 2px.

name: .nb-btn:focus-visible
purpose: Adds an underline to the button text when it is focused and visible.

name: .nb-btn:not(:disabled):hover
purpose: Changes the cursor to a pointer when hovering over a button that is not disabled.

name: .nb-btn > nucleus-icon
purpose: Applies a transformation to scale the icon to 1.4 times its size and translate it vertically by 10%.

name: .nb-btn > nucleus-icon.is-before
purpose: Adds a right margin of 0.5em to the icon when it appears before other elements.

name: .nb-btn > nucleus-icon.is-after
purpose: Adds a left margin of 0.5em and sets the width to 1.25rem and height to 0.9375rem for the icon when it appears after other elements.

name: .nb-btn.is-small
purpose: Styles a small button with specific padding values of 0.375em top, 0.825em sides, and 0.425em bottom.

name: .nb-btn--primary
purpose: Styles a primary button with white text color and a background color defined by the variable --nb-button-idle.

name: .nb-btn--primary:active,.nb-btn--primary:focus,.nb-btn--primary:not(:disabled):hover
purpose: Applies the active background color to primary buttons when they are focused, active, or hovered, unless disabled.

name: .nb-btn--secondary
purpose: Styles secondary buttons with idle color text, white background, and border matching the text color.

name: .nb-btn--secondary:active,.nb-btn--secondary:focus,.nb-btn--secondary:not(:disabled):hover
purpose: Changes secondary buttons to have white text and active color background and border when focused, active, or hovered, unless disabled.

name: .nb-btn--reversed
purpose: Styles reversed buttons with action-reversed color text, transparent background, and border matching the text color.

name: .nb-btn--reversed:focus
purpose: Applies the current color as the outline color for reversed buttons when focused.

name: .nb-btn--reversed:disabled
purpose: Styles a reversed button when disabled, setting its color to a disabled state using a variable or defaulting to #c8c8c8.

name: .nb-btn--reversed:active,.nb-btn--reversed:focus,.nb-btn--reversed:not(:disabled):hover
purpose: Applies a grayscale overlay background color to a reversed button when active, focused, or hovered (if not disabled).

name: .nb-btn--primary-reversed
purpose: Styles a primary reversed button with a specific font color, white background, and border color matching the current font color.

name: .nb-btn--primary-reversed:focus
purpose: Sets the outline color of a primary reversed button to match the current font color when focused.

name: .nb-btn--primary-reversed:disabled
purpose: Styles a primary reversed button when disabled, setting its color to a disabled state using a variable or defaulting to #c8c8c8.

name: .nb-btn--primary-reversed:active,.nb-btn--primary-reversed:focus,.nb-btn--primary-reversed:not(:disabled):hover
purpose: Applies a semi-transparent white background color when the primary reversed button is active, focused, or hovered.

name: .nb-btn--secondary-reversed
purpose: Styles the secondary reversed button with a transparent background, current color border, and a color defined by a CSS variable.

name: .nb-btn--secondary-reversed:focus
purpose: Sets the outline color to the current color when the secondary reversed button is focused.

name: .nb-btn--secondary-reversed:disabled
purpose: Changes the text color to a disabled state color when the secondary reversed button is disabled.

name: .nb-btn--secondary-reversed:active,.nb-btn--secondary-reversed:focus,.nb-btn--secondary-reversed:not(:disabled):hover
purpose: Applies a semi-transparent white background and changes the text color to a primary font color when the secondary reversed button is active, focused, or hovered.

name: .nb-btn.is-emphasized
purpose: Styles a button with emphasized colors, using a default idle color (#612166) and an active color (#4c1a51).

name: .nb-container
purpose: Centers the container with automatic left and right margins, sets a maximum width of 1500px, and adds padding of 2rem on both sides.

name: .nb-list
purpose: Applies padding of 2rem to the left, sets the font size to 1rem, and adjusts the line height to 1.5 for list elements.

name: .nb-list-item
purpose: Adds a padding of 0.5rem to the left of each list item.

name: .nb-breakout-link::before
purpose: Creates a block element before the link, covering the entire area with absolute positioning from top to bottom and left to right.
